title: The Regimen: Complete Acne.org Treatment Kit
description: Hi everybody, I'm Dan. I suffered for years with acne and tried everything. Like many of you have probably experienced as well, nothing worked. So, I went to work researching everything I possibly could about acne and after years of trial and error I found a treatment routine that cleared me up completely using only common drugstore products. I made Acne.org to share my regimen with the world. Pretty much everyone who follows it closely gets clear--even people with severe acne. After 6 years of The Regimen being completely not-for-profit, I developed a line of larger sized, higher quality products to make The Regimen more affordable and effective for everybody. Here they are! -Dan

title: Acne.org 16 oz. Cleanser
description: When treating acne, it is important to avoid irritation. This generously sized 16 oz. ultra-gentle liquid Cleanser is carefully designed with only the gentlest cleansing ingredients to be pH balanced so it doesn't overdry or strip the skin. It also produces a thick lather which cleanses just the right amount and rinses clean.This Cleanser was developed specifically for use with The Regimen (acne.org/regimen) but can also be used as a stand-alone cleanser for all skin types.

title: Almay Smart Shade Smart Balance Pressed Powderlight/medium, 0.20-Ounce
description: A Face Powder with breakthrough technology that combines shade sensing beads that transforms into your ideal shade while skin balancing beads keep oily areas shine free and dry areas hydrated.
